posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian Collie
All - 

Happy New Year.

I am interested in trading my T206 Orange Cobb if it can help me address some of my other collecting needs.  I know the worth placed on these color variations varies by collector - I for one though happen to like it a lot.   

[IMG]http://s205.photobucket.com/albums/bb184/becollie/th_T206OrangeCobb.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://s205.photobucket.com/albums/bb184/becollie/th_T206CobbOrange2.jpg[/IMG]

My wantlist includes:

T206 Young Glove
T206 Cobb Bat On/Off/Green
T206 Mathewson Portrait
T206 Keeler
T206 PSA 4 Common Lot
T202 Cobb
T3 HOFs (especially Johnson)

Please email me if interested.

Brian
